alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 2:11PM MDT until March 15 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Fergus County below 4500ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap
